title: Update Internet Identity alternative origins configuration

requirements.summary: Overwrite frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternative-origins with specified JSON containing four alternative origin URLs
acceptanceCriteria: The file contains exactly the specified JSON content with all four domain URLs

file_operations.description: Overwrite the entire file content with the following exact JSON: {"alternativeOrigins": ["https://v2.aftabstore.com","https://www.v2.aftabstore.com","https://aftabstore.com","https://www.aftabstore.com"]}. This configures Internet Identity to accept authentication from these four alternative domain origins.
